Related repos

  • open source registry for storing and distributing container images and OCI content
  • Open-source container runtime that manages container lifecycle
  • Optimizes Docker images using AI
  • Tool for managing Docker containers and images from a web interface
  • CLI tool for automating Docker image updates and notifications
  • manage containers and pods without a daemon
  • Container images for popular open source apps, security-focused updates coming soon
